sectionDiscover.title: What to expect at Anemone Café?
sectionDiscover.text:
Pick up your breakfast before work. Be able to come drink coffee or eat at any time of the day. Enjoy good specialty coffee and discover new drinks.

Enjoy the time to taste with our homemade pastries. Attend regular events. Meet at the aperitif time and enjoy our tapas to share.

sectionCoffeeShop_Patisseries.title: Coffee Shop & pastries
sectionCoffeeShop_Patisseries.text: Our coffee shop is minimalist yet unique, a place where everyone can find their place. We offer carefully selected specialty coffees roasted in the Val d'Oise. You'll also find all kinds of hot drinks, cold beverages and seasonal juices.

sectionBrunch.title: Brunch non-stop
sectionBrunch.text: There's no time for brunch! We'll be brunching from Wednesday to Sunday from 11am to 5pm non-stop. On the menu, savory and sweet gourmet dishes, pastries, hot and cold drinks... In short, there's something for everyone.

sectionTapas.title: Dishes to share in the form of tapas
sectionTapas.text: Sharing is at the heart of our work at Anémone Café, and it's also what we want to convey through our cuisine. That's why every evening we offer our dishes as tapas to share. Accompanied by a glass of good wine, all the ingredients are brought together for a great evening.

sectionReseaux.title: Our social networks
sectionReseaux.text: Come and get to know us on social networks, we're super active and you'll be up to date with the latest news before anyone else. If you're still not convinced, we often organize contests with prizes. It happens here ->

sectionPartenariats.title: our partnerships
sectionPartenariats.text: Our partnerships with local producers: It would be a shame to have quality products at hand and not take advantage of them! That's why Anémone Café has decided to partner with local producers to guarantee you the best on your plate, and to promote short supply chains wherever possible.

sectionDechets.title: Waste recovery
sectionDechets.text: Every little action counts, and it seemed crazy to us as restaurateurs not to make the most of our food waste. So we teamed up with..., which takes advantage of all the café's food waste to turn it into compost

event.title: ! Big opening night!
event.text: See you on January 25 for our opening party. On the program: tapas, wine, music and friends! We look forward to seeing you there.

menu.textBrunch: For breakfast, we offer a variety of high-quality hot drinks, as well as freshly squeezed seasonal juices. Also available are our cakes and other pastries, or our granola served with cheese. We offer brunch all week long, where you can compose your own menu with a savory dish and a sweet dish.
menu.textBoissons: You can enjoy our coffees, hot and cold drinks throughout the day. At Anémone, we offer specialty coffee and real drinks made by a barista: cappuccino, flat white, latte, matcha latte, chai latte, sesame latte...
menu.textDinner: For dinner at Anémone, it's tapas to share, dishes designed to be enjoyed with others, featuring quality products and innovative flavors. You'll also find platters, local wine, and beers.

reservation.title: Reserve a table
reservation.name: Name :
reservation.infoGroupe: For groups of more than 6 people, please contact us by e-mail: anemonecafe95@gmail.com
